text: Pas, kist sitamgortar az on ki ʙar Alloh taolo duruƣ meʙandad jo ojotasro duruƣ mepindorad? Onon kasone hastand, ki nasiʙason az onci [dar Lavhi mahfuz] muqarrar sudaast, ʙa eson xohad rasid, to on goh ki firistodagoni Mo ʙa suroƣason meojand, ki conasonro ʙigirand, [ʙa onon] megujand: «Onhoe, ki ʙa coji Alloh taolo meparastided, kuco hastand»? [Onon] Megujand: «Az [nazdi] mo gum sudand».Va [in guna] alajhi xud guvohi medihand, ki kofir ʙudaand
